title: Slum clearance in the thirties: the film evidence
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Housing development - Great Britain

description: Critically examines documentaries, newsreels and propaganda films which dealt with pre-war public housing and slum clearances in Britain and assesses their reality. Includes postwar footage and a complete 1942 documentary about redevelopment made by the Ministry of Information 'New Towns for Old'.
